TargetsMobile.Condition: '$(TargetOS)' == 'ios' or '$(TargetOS)' == 'iossimulator' or '$(TargetOS)' == 'maccatalyst' or '$(TargetOS)' == 'tvos' or '$(TargetOS)' == 'tvossimulator' or '$(TargetOS)' == 'android' or '$(TargetOS)' == 'browser' or '$(TargetOS)' == 'wasi'

TargetsUnix.Condition: '$(TargetsFreeBSD)' == 'true' or '$(Targetsillumos)' == 'true' or '$(TargetsSolaris)' == 'true' or '$(TargetsHaiku)' == 'true' or '$(TargetsLinux)' == 'true' or '$(TargetsNetBSD)' == 'true' or '$(TargetsOSX)' == 'true' or '$(TargetsMacCatalyst)' == 'true' or '$(TargetstvOS)' == 'true' or '$(TargetsiOS)' == 'true' or '$(TargetsAndroid)' == 'true'

_MonoSupportedArch.Condition: !('$(TargetOS)' == 'windows' and '$(TargetArchitecture)' == 'arm64') and !('$(TargetsLinuxMusl)' == 'true' and ('$(TargetArchitecture)' == 'arm' or '$(TargetArchitecture)' == 'arm64')) and !('$(TargetsLinuxBionic)' == 'true' and '$(TargetArchitecture)' == 'arm')

_NativeAotSupportedArch.Condition: '$(TargetArchitecture)' == 'x64' or '$(TargetArchitecture)' == 'arm64' or '$(TargetArchitecture)' == 'arm' or '$(TargetArchitecture)' == 'loongarch64' or '$(TargetArchitecture)' == 'riscv64' or ('$(TargetOS)' == 'windows' and '$(TargetArchitecture)' == 'x86')

SubsetName.Description: The full CoreCLR runtime. Equivalent to: $(DefaultCoreClrSubsets)
Managed tools that support building the native components of the runtime (such as DacTableGen).
The CoreCLR IL tools (ilasm/ildasm).
The CoreCLR .NET runtime. Includes clr.jit, clr.iltools, clr.hosts.

All CoreCLR native non-test components, including the runtime, jits, and other native tools. Includes clr.hosts, clr.runtime, clr.jit, clr.alljits, clr.paltests, clr.iltools, clr.nativeaotruntime, clr.spmi.
Everything needed for Native AOT workloads, including clr.alljits, clr.tools, clr.nativeaotlibs, and clr.nativeaotruntime
The CoreCLR native AOT CoreLib and other low level class libraries.
The stripped-down CoreCLR native AOT runtime.
The cross-targeted CoreCLR tools.
The CoreCLR PAL tests.
Generate the list of the CoreCLR PAL tests. When using the command line, use Clr.PalTests instead.
The CoreCLR corerun test host.
The JIT for the CoreCLR .NET runtime.
The cross-targeting WebAssembly JIT compiler for the CoreCLR .NET runtime.
All of the cross-targeting JIT compilers for the CoreCLR .NET runtime.
All of the cross-targeting JIT compilers for the CoreCLR .NET runtime, including community targets.
SuperPMI, a tool for CoreCLR JIT testing.
The managed System.Private.CoreLib library for CoreCLR.
Run crossgen on System.Private.CoreLib library for CoreCLR.
Managed tools that support CoreCLR development and testing.
Unit tests for the clr.tools subset.
The projects that produce NuGet packages for the CoreCLR runtime, crossgen, and IL tools.
The cross-OS Windows->libc-based Linux DAC. Skipped on x86.
The cross-OS Windows->musl-libc-based Linux DAC. Skipped on x86
Packaging of cross OS DAC. Requires all assets needed to be present at a folder specified by $(CrossDacArtifactsDir). See 'Microsoft.CrossOsDiag.Private.CoreCLR.proj' for details.
The Mono runtime and CoreLib. Equivalent to: $(DefaultMonoSubsets)
The Mono .NET runtime.
The emsdk provisioning.
The cross-compiler runtime for Mono AOT.
The managed System.Private.CoreLib library for Mono.
The NuGet packages with manifests defining the mobile and Blazor workloads.
The projects that produce NuGet packages for the Mono runtime.
Tooling that helps support Mono development and testing.
The Emscripten runtime.
The WASI runtime.
*Helper* subset for building some pre-requisites for wasm workload testing, useful on CI.
The implementation of ICorDebug interface.
Builds the installers and the insertion metadata for Blazor workloads.
Additional runtime tools projects. Equivalent to: $(DefaultToolsSubsets)
The projects that produce illink and analyzer tools for trimming.
Diagnostic data contract reader and related projects.
Unit tests for the tools.illink subset.
Unit tests for the diagnostic data contract reader.
Build only the managed ilasm tool.
The .NET hosts, packages, hosting libraries, and tests. Equivalent to: $(DefaultHostSubsets)
The .NET hosts.
The .NET host packages.
The .NET hosting libraries.
Test assets which are necessary to run the .NET hosting tests.
The .NET hosting tests.
The libraries native part, refs and source assemblies, test infra and packages, but NOT the tests (use Libs.Tests to request those explicitly). Equivalent to: $(DefaultLibrariesSubsets)
The native libraries used in the shared framework.
The managed shared framework libraries.
The managed out-of-band libraries.
Test assets which are necessary to run tests.
The test projects. Note that building this doesn't execute tests: you must also pass the '-test' argument.
Builds the shared framework packs, archives, bundles, installers, and the framework pack tests. Equivalent to: $(DefaultPacksSubsets)
Builds the shared framework packs, archives, bundles, and installers.
Builds the shared framework bundles and installers.
The framework pack tests.
Regenerates the THIRD-PARTY-NOTICES.TXT file based on other repos' TPN files.
Build the repo local task projects.
Build the projects needed to build shipping assets in the repo against live assets.
Includes all available subsets for comprehensive restore/build operations. This includes all regular subsets and on-demand subsets.

ItemGroup.Condition: $(_subset.Contains('+mono.llvm+')) or $(_subset.Contains('+mono.aotcross+')) or '$(TargetOS)' == 'ios' or '$(TargetOS)' == 'iossimulator' or '$(TargetOS)' == 'tvos' or '$(TargetOS)' == 'tvossimulator' or '$(TargetOS)' == 'maccatalyst' or '$(TargetOS)' == 'android' or '$(TargetOS)' == 'browser' or '$(TargetOS)' == 'wasi' or '$(TargetsLinuxBionic)' == 'true'

IsXUnitLogCheckerSupported.Condition: '$(RuntimeFlavor)' == 'CoreCLR' and '$(TestNativeAot)' != 'true' and '$(RunNativeAotTestApps)' != 'true' and '$(TestSingleFile)' != 'true' and '$(TargetOS)' != 'browser' and '$(TargetOS)' != 'wasi' and '$(TargetOS)' != 'ios' and '$(TargetOS)' != 'iossimulator' and '$(TargetOS)' != 'tvos' and '$(TargetOS)' != 'tvossimulator' and '$(TargetOS)' != 'maccatalyst' and '$(TargetOS)' != 'android'

IsSourceProject.Condition: '$(IsSourceProject)' == '' and '$(IsReferenceAssemblyProject)' != 'true' and '$(IsGeneratorProject)' != 'true' and '$(IsTestProject)' != 'true' and '$(IsTrimmingTestProject)' != 'true' and '$(IsTestSupportProject)' != 'true' and '$(UsingMicrosoftDotNetSharedFrameworkSdk)' != 'true' and '$(MSBuildProjectExtension)' != '.pkgproj' and '$(UsingMicrosoftNoTargetsSdk)' != 'true' and '$(UsingMicrosoftTraversalSdk)' != 'true'

PropertyGroup.Condition: '$(UseDefaultPublishRuntimeIdentifier)' == '' And '$(PublishRuntimeIdentifier)' == '' And '$(RuntimeIdentifier)' == '' And '$(_IsExecutable)' == 'true' And ( '$(PublishSelfContained)' == 'true' or '$(PublishReadyToRun)' == 'true' or '$(PublishTrimmed)' == 'true' or '$(PublishSingleFile)' == 'true' or '$(PublishAot)' == 'true' ) And !('$(PackAsTool)' == 'true' And '$(_IsPacking)' == 'true')

Error.Text: The following .NET Standard 1.x packages are referenced and must be removed: %0D%0A- @(FoundNetStandard1xPackage, '%0D%0A- ')%0D%0AConsult the project.assets.json files to find the parent dependencies.
Internal MSBuild error: CrossTargeting GetTargetFrameworks target should only be used in cross targeting (outer) build

RestoreEnablePackagePruning.Condition: '$(RestoreEnablePackagePruning)' == '' AND '$(UsingMicrosoftNETSdk)' == 'true' AND '$(TargetFrameworks)' == '' AND '$(NuGetExeSkipSdkAnalysisLevelCheck)' != 'true' AND '$(SdkAnalysisLevel)' != '' AND $([MSBuild]::VersionGreaterThanOrEquals('$(SdkAnalysisLevel)', '10.0.100')) AND ('$(TargetFrameworkIdentifier)' == '.NETCoreApp' AND '$(TargetFrameworkVersion)' != '' AND $([MSBuild]::VersionGreaterThanOrEquals('$(TargetFrameworkVersion)', '10.0')))

RestorePackagePruningDefault.Condition: '$(UsingMicrosoftNETSdk)' == 'true' AND '$(NuGetExeSkipSdkAnalysisLevelCheck)' != 'true' AND '$(SdkAnalysisLevel)' != '' AND $([MSBuild]::VersionGreaterThanOrEquals('$(SdkAnalysisLevel)', '10.0.100')) AND ('$(TargetFrameworkIdentifier)' == '.NETCoreApp' AND '$(TargetFrameworkVersion)' != '' AND $([MSBuild]::VersionGreaterThanOrEquals('$(TargetFrameworkVersion)', '10.0')))

Error.Text: Missing RestoreGraphOutputPath property!

_FilteredRestoreGraphProjectInputItemsTm.Condition: '%(RestoreGraphProjectInputItems.Extension)' == '.csproj' Or '%(RestoreGraphProjectInputItems.Extension)' == '.vbproj' Or '%(RestoreGraphProjectInputItems.Extension)' == '.fsproj' Or '%(RestoreGraphProjectInputItems.Extension)' == '.nuproj' Or '%(RestoreGraphProjectInputItems.Extension)' == '.proj' Or '%(RestoreGraphProjectInputItems.Extension)' == '.msbuildproj' Or '%(RestoreGraphProjectInputItems.Extension)' == '.vcxproj'

Error.Text: Missing RestoreGraphOutputPath property!

The CoreCLR artifacts path does not exist '$(CoreCLRArtifactsPath)'. The 'clr' subset must be built before building this project. Configuration: '$(CoreCLRConfiguration)'. To use a different configuration, specify the 'RuntimeConfiguration' property.

The Mono artifacts path does not exist '$(MonoArtifactsPath)'. The 'mono' subset must be built before building this project. Configuration: '$(MonoConfiguration)'. To use a different configuration, specify the 'RuntimeConfiguration' property.
The '$(RuntimeFlavor)' subset must be built before building this project.

The 'libs' subset must be built before building this project. Missing artifacts: $(LibrariesSharedFrameworkRefArtifactsPath). Configuration: '$(LibrariesConfiguration)'. To use a different configuration, specify the 'LibrariesConfiguration' property.

The 'libs' subset must be built before building this project. Missing artifacts: $(LibrariesAllRefArtifactsPath). Configuration: '$(LibrariesConfiguration)'. To use a different configuration, specify the 'LibrariesConfiguration' property.

The 'libs' subset must be built before building this project. Missing artifacts: $(LibrariesSharedFrameworkBinArtifactsPath). Configuration: '$(LibrariesConfiguration)'. To use a different configuration, specify the 'LibrariesConfiguration' property.

The 'libs' subset must be built before building this project. Missing artifacts: $(LibrariesAllBinArtifactsPath). Configuration: '$(LibrariesConfiguration)'. To use a different configuration, specify the 'LibrariesConfiguration' property.

The 'libs' subset must be built before building this project. Missing artifacts: $(LibrariesNativeArtifactsPath). Configuration: '$(LibrariesConfiguration)'. To use a different configuration, specify the 'LibrariesConfiguration' property.
The 'libs' subset must be built before building this project.
The 'libs' subset must be built before building this project.
PublicKey, PublicKeyToken and AssemblyOriginatorKeyFile must be specified
Item "%(GenerateChecksumItems.Identity)" does not define required metadata "DestinationPath"
GenerateResxSource doesn't support language: '$(Language)'
PackageDescription must be specified
PackageProjectUrl must be specified
RepositoryUrl must be specified
RepositoryCommit must be specified
RepositoryType must be specified
Either PackageLicenseExpression or PackageLicenseFile must be specified

PropertyGroup._NativeVersionFileContents: #ifndef VER_COMPANYNAME_STR #define VER_COMPANYNAME_STR "Microsoft Corporation" #endif #ifndef VER_FILEDESCRIPTION_STR #define VER_FILEDESCRIPTION_STR "$(AssemblyName)" #endif #ifndef VER_INTERNALNAME_STR #define VER_INTERNALNAME_STR VER_FILEDESCRIPTION_STR #endif #ifndef VER_ORIGINALFILENAME_STR #define VER_ORIGINALFILENAME_STR VER_FILEDESCRIPTION_STR #endif #ifndef VER_PRODUCTNAME_STR #define VER_PRODUCTNAME_STR ".NET" #endif #undef VER_PRODUCTVERSION #define VER_PRODUCTVERSION $(_WindowsFileVersion) #undef VER_PRODUCTVERSION_STR #define VER_PRODUCTVERSION_STR "$(Version)$(_SourceBuildInfo)" #undef VER_FILEVERSION #define VER_FILEVERSION $(_WindowsFileVersion) #undef VER_FILEVERSION_STR #define VER_FILEVERSION_STR "$(_WindowsFileVersion)$(_SourceBuildInfo)" #ifndef VER_LEGALCOPYRIGHT_STR #define VER_LEGALCOPYRIGHT_STR "\xa9 Microsoft Corporation. All rights reserved." #endif #ifndef VER_DEBUG #define VER_DEBUG $(_Windows_VER_DEBUG) #endif

Error.Text: Test runner $(TestRunnerName) is invalid.
Performance tests failed: ExitCode = $(_TestErrorCode)

PropertyGroup.RuntimePackageDisclaimer: Internal implementation package not meant for direct consumption. Please do not reference directly.

Error.Text: The passed-in TargetOS property value '$(TargetOS)' must be lowercase.
Reference assemblies must be TargetPlatform agnostic. $(MSBuildProjectName) incorrectly targets $(TargetFramework), platform: $(TargetPlatformIdentifier).
The current .NET SDK ($(NETCoreSdkVersion)) doesn't support containerization. Please use version 7.0.100 or higher to enable containerization.

Warning.Text: The property 'ContainerImageName' was set but is obsolete - please use 'ContainerRepository' instead.

Warning.Condition: $(_ContainerPackageIsPresent) and ( ($(_SdkCanPublishWeb) and $(_IsWebProject)) or ($(_SdkCanPublishWorker) and $(_IsWorkerProject)) or ($(_SdkCanPublishConsole) and '$(EnableSdkContainerSupport)' == 'true') )
Warning.Text: The $(_ContainersPackageIdentity) NuGet package is explicitly referenced but the current SDK can natively publish the project as a container. Consider removing the package reference to $(_ContainersPackageIdentity) because it is no longer needed.

Error.Text: Containers cannot be published for multiple TargetFrameworks at this time. Please specify a TargetFramework.
